parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: ResourceNames
parameters.description: The names of the resources. You can specify up to 50 resource names.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type.

Enumerated values:

*   role: RAM roles.
*   policy: policies.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags. You can specify up to 20 tags.
